item.description:
Tall trees, quiet rivers, campsites on scenic hills, sand dunes, ocean surf, exotic wildlife, and more are all awaiting you along the Bibbulmun Track. Share the experience of walking several sections on this premier long-distance trail of almost thousand kilometers through South West Australia.

Join us as Grigory Petrov shares his experience including the challenges, opportunities, and incredible diversity that the track offers to all kind of hikers

Doors open @ 6:15 PM - potluck @ 6:30 PM then show @ 7:15 PM

If you have any questions, please contact Julie at AMCBostonSlideshows@gmail.com.

For those who wish to participate in the potluck at 6:30pm, feel free to use the following guidelines: Last names beginning with K-Z bring a main dish, A-J bring an appetizer or side dish. 

 Homemade dishes are welcome, store bought goodies & takeout are equally welcome. Plates, bowls, cups, cutlery, napkins and drink pitchers will be supplied. The AMC Auditorium has a kitchen if you need to do any re-warming or prep (stovetop, oven, microwave, sink, fridge, etc). Please bring your own cooking pots for rewarming dishes on the stovetop.

In the event of a schedule change or cancellation, an email will be sent out to those who RSVP.

Subway Directions: Take the Red Line T to Park Street Station. Walk through the Boston Common uphill towards the State House & Beacon Street. Continue up Joy St, which runs along the left side of the State House. The Auditorium is #4 Joy Street (just before the AMC Headquarters Building, on the left side).
item.name: Hiking along the Bibbulmun Track in Australia (Potluck & Slideshow)
